archimate:Requirement.name: IR.2.6.3e: e) identifying specialised security controls required by particular environments (e.g. application allowlisting, Intrusion Prevention Systems (IPS), Digital Rights Management (DRM) or strong authentication).
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
